definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Through God's grace, the Lenten disciplines can bring about growth in Christ-likeness.
sentences.chinese: 通過神的恩典，大齋節的操練能帶來基督形象的成長。

sentences.english: Today marks the beginning of the church's forty-day season of Lent.
sentences.chinese: 今天是教會大齋節四十天的開始。
